question: Which country forms the location of the yacht race "Route du Rhum"?
explanation: The Route du Rhum is a transatlantic single-handed yacht race, which takes place every four years in November. The starting point of the race is Saint-Malo, a port in the Brittany cultural region of France. The ending point is Pointe-a-Pitre, a city of Guadeloupe an overseas territory of France.
